content: *cozy crochet slippers with festive holly berries and leaves are an excellent project for your family guests and gifts sizes m-l foot length 9-10 in shown in patons classic wool crochet using size 4 mm u s g or 6 and 5 5 mm u s i or 9 hooks patons yarns * skill level easy sizes to fit foot length medium 9 ins \ 23 cm large 10 ins \ 25 5 cm materials patons® classic wool 100 g / 3 5 oz main color mc 00240 leaf green medium or large 2 balls contrast a 00220 bottle green medium or large 1 ball contrast b 00230 bright red medium or large 1 ball *3 colors 4 balls total* sizes 4 mm u s g or 6 and 5 5 mm u s i or 9 crochet hooks or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 15 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 ins \ 10 cm with 4 mm crochet hook 12 single_crochet and 12 row = 4 ins \ 10 cm with 5 5 mm crochet hook and 2 strands of yarn features holly leaf and berry applique decoration *ed note suitable for males if made without the decoration * knit version slippers knit 5 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/slippers-knit
